snippet: Three days after the collapse, the recovery of 10 more bodies from the site on the outskirts of Chennai raised the death toll to 30.
abstract: Four people are rescued from rubble of 12-story building three days after its collapse in southern India; rescuers also uncover 10 bodies at the site, bringing death toll to 30; no one was yet living in the new building, which crumpled in heavy rain.
lead_paragraph: Three days after the collapse, the recovery of 10 more bodies from the site on the outskirts of Chennai raised the death toll to 30.

headline.main: 4 Are Rescued Days After Building Collapse in South India
headline.print_headline: 4 Are Rescued Days After Building Collapse in South India
